LanguageData.Epona_Call_Peasantry.label: Peasant Laborer
LanguageData.Epona_Call_Peasantry.description: Treat four Peasants almost for free for three days!
LanguageData.Epona_Call_ArmedPeasantry.label: Peasant Levy
LanguageData.Epona_Call_FreeCompany.label: Call Free Company
LanguageData.Epona_Call_FreeCompany.description: call eight veteran mercenaries to the battlefield.
LanguageData.Epona_Hire_Squire.label: Knight-Servant Contract
LanguageData.Epona_Hire_Squire.description: It is a contract between the knight and the servant.
LanguageData.Epona_Get_Powerarmor.label: Royal Power Armor Award
LanguageData.Epona_Get_Powerarmor.description: You can receive the steam-powered Epona exclusive power armor from the king.
LanguageData.Epona_Call_Knight.label: Call Fianna
LanguageData.Epona_Call_MassPeasantry.label: Mass Peasantry Mobilization
LanguageData.Epona_Call_MassPeasantry.description: Forced mobilization of 10 serfs for one week.
LanguageData.Epona_Call_KnightDestrier.label: Call Destrier Fianna

LanguageData.Epona_Call_Redshank.label: Call Redshank Sharpshooter Company

LanguageData.Epona_Call_FreeLance.label: Call Freelancers
LanguageData.Epona_Call_FreeLance.description: "Arise, arise, Riders of Eponen!" 5 heavily armed lancers are called to the battlefield.
LanguageData.Epona_Call_DoctorAdvanced.label: Call Uniponen Fieldmedic
LanguageData.Epona_Call_DoctorAdvanced.description: A highly trained unicorn doctor is called for 3 days.
